text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I want to show
you how to make in rugal salad with
grilled peaches and smoked mozzarella it
is delicious
now I had something very similar to this
recently my husband and I took a
vacation went on a cruise and if you
know I think that cruise is you know
you're filled with delicious food and
one of the things we had was a salad it
had grilled a stone fruit on top of it
and like a smoky Gouda like type cheese
and I thought I can recreate that at
home but with ingredients I can get my
hands on and I I know you can get your
hands on peaches everybody can and I'm
using smoked mozzarella because it's
very smoky it goes really well with the
grilled peaches and I can find that in
my local supermarket so that's awesome
so let's go over the ingredients to get
started you need some smoked mozzarella
fresh peaches extra virgin olive oil
balsamic glaze or balsamic vinegar some
fresh arugula and of course salt and
pepper couldn't be easier now first I'm
going to do is get your grill pan nice
and hot because we're just going to
blister the peaches for a couple minutes
just to give them that smoky flavor and
it's just awesome now I'm just going to
want to make sure when you buy your
peaches you buy them in season of course
and for this recipe is really important
that they are kind of firm they're not
too too soft but that they're you know
they when you press them in touch they
give a little you know you can tell
that's a nice ripe peach and it's not
like super hard because that mean I'll
have no flavor so I'm just going to cut
the peach in half around the stone or
the pit whatever you call it just like
so and I'm just going to remove the
stone here we go
now I'm just going to drizzle a touch of
extra virgin olive oil onto these so
that they don't stick it's lovely just
like that now I'm just going to go over

on the hot grill for about two minutes

cool slightly and then we'll

little so I get distributed whoa
that looks good I'm not going to be too

it's got a really fantastic smoky flavor
it's not super watery so it holds its
